Description: The French Revolution was a period of radical political and societal change in France.
The Battle of Waterloo was the final battle of the Napoleonic Wars.
The American Civil War was a civil war in the United States from 1861 to 1865.
World War I was a global war that lasted from 1914 to 1918.
Jean Perrin and Jean Zay created CNRS.
World War II was a global war that lasted from 1939 to 1945.
